xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
############################################################################### # WikiManager Manager translation page # # The translations contained in this page are used in the default UI (see xwiki-platform-web), # that can be displayed in subwikis too. That is why the scope of this page is GLOBAL. # # This contains the translations of the module in the default language # (generally English). # # Translation key syntax: # <short top level project name>.<short module name>.<propertyName> # where: # * <short top level project name> = top level project name without the "xwiki-" prefix, # for example: commons, rendering, platform, enterprise, manager, etc # * <short module name> = the name of the Maven module without the <short top level project name> prefix, # for example: oldcore, scheduler, activitystream, etc # * <propertyName> = the name of the property using camel case, # for example updateJobClassCommitComment # # Comments: it's possible to add some detail about a key to make easier to # translate it by adding a comment before it. To make sure a comment is not # assigned to the following key use at least three sharps (###) for the comment # or after it. # # Deprecated keys: # * when deleting a key it should be moved to deprecated section at the end # of the file (between #@deprecatedstart and #@deprecatedend) and associated to the # first version in which it started to be deprecated # * when renaming a key, it should be moved to the same deprecated section # and a comment should be added with the following syntax: # #@deprecated new.key.name # old.key.name=Some translation ###############################################################################
## Menus platform.wiki.menu.wikiindex=Indeks Wiki platform.wiki.menu.deletewiki=Usuń Wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.menu.userwikis=Wikis
## Dependencies ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.wiki.missing=The "Wiki" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki API" and "Wiki Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.template.missing=The "Wiki Template" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki Template API" and "Wiki Template Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.user.missing=The "Wiki User" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki User API" and "Wiki User Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation).
## Create platform.wiki.create.button=Utwórz Wiki platform.wiki.create.title=Utwórz nową wiki platform.wiki.create.members=CZŁONKOWIE platform.wiki.create.prettyname.empty=Ładna nazwa nie może być pusta platform.wiki.create.error=Utworzenie wiki "{0}" nie powiodło się: {1}. platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.databasealreadyexists=Baza danych o tym identyfikatorze już istnieje platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.wikialreadyexists=Ten identyfikator jest już użyty platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.empty=Identyfikator nie może być pusty
## Common errors and messages platform.wiki.error.wikidoesnotexist=Wiki [{0}] nie istnieje platform.wiki.error.oneParameterNotSpecified=Parametr ''{0}'' nie został określony. platform.wiki.error.parameterAcceptsMultipleValues=Możliwe wiele wartości. platform.wiki.error.exceptionWithMessage=Wyjątek: {0} platform.wiki.form.requiredField=Wymagane platform.wiki.csrf.error=Token bezpieczeństwa jest nieprawidłowy. Proszę powtórz operację.
## Users platform.wiki.users.userAlreadyMemberOfWiki=Użytkownik {0}{1}{2} jest już członkiem wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.userNotMemberOfWiki=Użytkownik {0}{1}{2} nie jest członkiem wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.logInToContinue=Aby kontynuować musisz się najpierw {0}zalogować{1}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedNotification=The user ''{0}'' ({1}) has accepted the invitation to join the wiki ''{2}'' ({3}). ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedSuccess=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully accepted the invitation and joined the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.userRejectedSuccess=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully rejected the invitation to join the wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.error.needInvitation=Ta wiki jest dostępna tylko po otrzymaniu zaproszenia od administratorów. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.pendingRequestExists=The user {0}{1}{2} already has a pending request to join the wiki {3}{4}{5}. Please wait for a wiki admin to review it. platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelConfirmation=Czy na pewno chcesz anulować wniosek o przyłączenie do wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelYes=Tak platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelNo=Nie ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelSuccess=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully cancelled the request to join the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.saveNotification=The user ''{0}'' ({1}) has requested to join the wiki ''{2}'' ({3}). ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully sent the request to join wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.confirmation=Are you sure you want to join the wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.yes=Tak platform.wiki.users.join.no=Nie ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully joined wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.error.userIsOwner=The user {0}{1}{2} is the owner of the wiki {3}{4}{5}. The owner of a wiki cannot leave it unless the wiki is deleted or the owner is changed. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation=Are you sure you want to leave wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.yes=Tak platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.no=Nie ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully left wiki {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.title=Dołącz do wiki platform.wiki.users.leave.title=Opuść wiki "{0}" platform.wiki.users.leave.empty= platform.wiki.users.delete.title=Usuń wiki "{0}" platform.wiki.users.delete.empty= ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.hint=A reply message to send, viewable by the wiki admin, in which you can motivate your decision. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.hint=To join the wiki {0}{1}{2}, you must first issue a join request. After doing so, a wiki admin will review and consider your request. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.hint=A message to send, viewable by the wiki admin, in which you can motivate this join request. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.title=You have been invited to join the wiki {0}{1}{2}. platform.wiki.users.invitation.message.label=Zaproszenie platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.title=Odpowiedz platform.wiki.users.invitation.accept.label=Akceptuj platform.wiki.users.invitation.reject.label=Odrzuć platform.wiki.users.invitation.postpone.label=Później platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.label=Wiadomość platform.wiki.users.join.request.send.label=Wyślij zapytanie platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancel.label=Wstecz
## User profile ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.profile.joinedwikis.label=Joined wikis platform.wiki.users.profile.joinedwikis.notMemberOfAnyWiki=Nie jesteś jeszcze członkiem żadnej wiki platform.wiki.users.profile.joinedwikis.userNotMemberOfAnyWiki=Użytkownik nie jest jeszcze członkiem żadnej wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.profile.activity.title=Activity of wiki {0} ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.profile.activity.hint=Generates an activity stream for the given wiki(s). ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.profile.activity.multipletitle=Activity of wikis {0} ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.profile.activity.show=show activity
## Wiki Deletion platform.wiki.delete.confirmation=Jesteś pewny, że chcesz usunąć wiki {0}{1}{2}? ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.confirmation.retypeWikiId=Please repeat the identifier of the wiki here: ### Missing: platform.wiki.delete.error.wikiIdDoesNotMatch=Type in the exact Wiki Identifier of the wiki that should be deleted. platform.wiki.delete.success=Użytkownik {0}{1}{2} pomyślnie usunął wiki "{3}".
## Wiki macro ### Missing: platform.wiki.macro.noWikis=There are currently no wikis created (except the main one). ### Missing: rendering.macro.wikis.name=Wikis ### Missing: rendering.macro.wikis.description=List all wikis
## LegacyWorkspaces macro ### Missing: rendering.macro.workspaces.name=Workspaces (Legacy) ### Missing: rendering.macro.workspaces.description=Deprecated macro that should not be used here for compatibility reasons. Please use the "wikis" macro instead.
## Browse platform.wiki.browse=Przeglądaj wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.browse.emptyvalue=N/A platform.wiki.browse.wikiprettyname=Nazwa platform.wiki.browse.description=Opis platform.wiki.browse.owner=Właściciel platform.wiki.browse.membershipType=Typ członkostwa platform.wiki.browse.doc.creationDate=Data stworzenia platform.wiki.browse._actions=Akcje platform.wiki.browse._actions.join=Dołącz platform.wiki.browse._actions.requestJoin=Zapytaj o dołączenie platform.wiki.browse._actions.viewInvitation=Pokaż zaproszenie platform.wiki.browse._actions.cancelJoinRequest=Cofnij zapytanie platform.wiki.browse._actions.leave=Opuść platform.wiki.browse._actions.delete=Usuń
## Classes WikiManager.WikiUserClass_membershipType_open=Każdy może dołączyć WikiManager.WikiUserClass_membershipType_request=Każdy globalny użytkownik może zapytać o dołączenie ale admin musi zaakceptować WikiManager.WikiUserClass_membershipType_invite=Tylko admin może wysyłać zaproszenia do tej wiki. WikiManager.WikiUserClass_userScope_local_only=Tylko użytkownicy lokalni są dostępni w wiki WikiManager.WikiUserClass_userScope_global_only=Tylko globalni użytkownicy są dostępni WikiManager.WikiUserClass_userScope_local_and_global=Zarówno użytkownicy globalni jak i lokalni są dostępni w wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.prop.wikiname=Wiki Identifier ### Missing: platform.wiki.prop.wikiprettyname=Pretty Name ### Missing: platform.wiki.prop.wikialias=Alias ### Missing: platform.wiki.prop.description=Description ### Missing: platform.wiki.prop.owner=Owner ### Missing: platform.wiki.prop.membershipType.label=Membership Type ### Missing: platform.wiki.prop.membershipType.hint=The way users can join this wiki.
## Wizard platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiname=Unikatowy identyfikator nowej wiki. platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiprettyname=Nazwa wyświetlana wiki platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikialias=Domena która będzie prowadzić do tej wiki. platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.newTemplateHint=Szablon do użycia dla tej nowej wiki(wszystkie dokumenty zostaną sklonowane). platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.description=Krótki opis wiki i jej zastosowania. platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.owner=Użytkownik który ma wszystkie prawa do tej wiki niezależnie od praw skonfigurowanych w Administracji. platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.members=Użytkownicy którzy uczestniczą w tej wiki. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType=Krok 1 — Wybierz nazwę platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType.shortname=Nazwa platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users=Krok 2 — Wybierz członków platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users.shortname=Użytkownicy platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp=Czyszczenie platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.provisioning.cleanUp=Wyczyść i usuń wiki platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.success=Wiki {0} została usunięta pomyślnie. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.error=Bład, wiki {0} nie została usunięta. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirmmessage=Chcesz usunąć wiki {0}. Proszę potwierdzić. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirm=Zatwierdzanie platform.wiki.create.wizard.setAsTemplate.label=Ta wiki będzie szablonem platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.noTemplate=Brak szablonu (domyślne) platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.label=Zakres użytkowników platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.hint=Wybierz jaki rodzaj użytkowników ma mieć dostęp do wiki platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.label=Szablon ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.label=Flavor / Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.hint=Flavor or Template to use as the initial content of the new wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.flavorTab=Flavor ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.templateTab=Template platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.dw=Po kliknięciu na "utwórz" wiki zostanie utworzona ale Kreator Dystrybucji zostanie uruchomiony w celu zainicjalizowania twojej wiki. Jeśli go pominiesz twoja wiki będzie pusta. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.previous=Poprzedni krok platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.next=Przejdź do następnego kroku platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.create=Utwórz
### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation=Wiki creation ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.wait=Please wait until the wiki is created. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.complete=The wiki {0} has been successfully created. You can now access it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.error=The wiki {0} has been created but some pages have not been installed. Consequently, the wiki might behave erroneously and you should probably delete it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.go=Go to the wiki
## Admin ### Missing: admin.wikis.description=Wikis management. ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates=Wiki Templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.description=Manage the wiki templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.hint=A template is a wiki that will be considered as a model to create new wikis. When a user selects a template to create a new wiki, all the content of the template is copied in the new wiki. admin.wikis.rights=Prawo tworzenia wikie
## XWikiServer Sheet ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title=Descriptor of the wiki \"{0}\" ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.erroraliasalreadynotexists=Wiki alias \"{0}\" already exists. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.erroraliasdoesnotexists=Wiki alias \"{0}\" does not exists. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title.settings=Wiki properties ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title.createnewalias=Create new alias ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title.viewaliases=View aliases ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.owner=A user who will have all the rights on this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.secure=If enabled, all this wiki's generated externals URLs will start with \"https\". ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.iswikitemplate=Indicate if this wiki can be used as a template when creating a new wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.server=The alias used to access the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.description=A brief wiki description. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.homepage=The homepage of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.wikiprettyname=Pretty name ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.owner=Owner ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.secure=Secure (SSL) ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.description=Description ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.server=Alias ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.homepage=Homepage ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.iswikitemplate=Wiki template ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor=This page defines how to access the \"{0}\" wiki, and some properties about it. For more configurations, please go to the ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor.admin=administration page of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.aliases=An alias is another name for the wiki. You can add aliases to create different URLs for the wiki.

## Used to indicate where deprecated keys start #@deprecatedstart
####################################### ## until 6.1 ####################################### platform.wiki.dependencies.applicationmanager.missing={0}Menedżer Aplikacji{1} nie jest zainstalowany. Zainstaluj go i spróbuj ponownie.
####################################### ## until 6.4RC1 ####################################### admin.wikis=Wiki admin.wikis.template=Szablon wiki

System zaopatruje wiki. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.provisioning.complete=Wiki jest prawie gotowa. Kliknij "finalizuj" aby dokończyć proces tworzenia. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.provisioning.error=Wiki {0} została utworzona ale parę dokumentów zawartych w szablonie nie zostało skopiowanych. Powinieneś je prawdopodobnie usunąć. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.provisioning.finalize=Finalizuj
####################################### ## until 9.5-rc-1 ####################################### platform.wiki.delete.confirmation.yes=Tak platform.wiki.delete.confirmation.no=Nie
